last_episode_to_air.name: Steeled With a Kiss (2)
last_episode_to_air.overview: Laura and Steele visit the Irish castle he's inherited and decide to hide Tony there until he can prove he isn't a double agent. Daniel Chalmers must turn him over to the KGB as part of a scam he is running to help the daughter of an old friend.

name: Remington Steele
overview: Laura Holt, a licensed private detective, opens a detective agency but finds that potential clients refuse to hire a woman, however qualified. To solve the problem, Laura invents a fictitious male superior whom she names Remington Steele. Through a series of events that unfold in the first episode, "License to Steele," a former thief and con man, whose real name is never revealed, assumes the identity of Remington Steele. Behind the scenes, Laura remains firmly in charge.

episodes.name: License to Steele
episodes.overview: "License to Steele" is the premiere episode of the television series Remington Steele. This episode introduces and sets all the central elements of the series; the truth about Laura's fictional boss, the mysterious character posing as Steele, the romantic tension, Steele's love of old movies, et cetera.

episodes.name: Tempered Steele
episodes.overview: Laura tackles a case of industrial espionage in a family-owned business while Steele enlists an old pal to help him install a burglar alarm.

episodes.name: Steele Waters Run Deep
episodes.overview: A video game genius disappears just before a merger, with $5 million and the plans for his company's latest video game.

episodes.name: Signed, Steeled, & Delivered
episodes.overview: Laura and Steele spend the weekend trying to keep a CIA researcher alive and on time for his wedding.

episodes.name: Thou Shalt Not Steele
episodes.overview: A woman from Steele's past asks him to help her steal a valuable painting that Laura has already agreed to protect.

episodes.name: Steele Belted
episodes.overview: A loser asks the agency to help him, but his alibi witness is found dead in Steele's apartment and his lawyer seems more interested in Laura than in the case.

episodes.name: Etched in Steele
episodes.overview: Laura and Steele investigate the murder of an author whose steamy novels badly mirror her own married life.

episodes.name: Your Steele the One For Me
episodes.overview: A lesson in detective work for Steele escalates a jaywalking accident into an encounter with Japanese gangsters.

episodes.name: In the Steele of the Night
episodes.overview: Steele investigates a murder when Laura's former colleagues gather for a reunion and old grievances begin to re-emerge.

episodes.name: Steele Trap
episodes.overview: A client commits suicide in the office so Steele and Laura attend a house party on an island owned by a wealthy publisher in his place in an attempt to find out why.

episodes.name: Steeling the Show
episodes.overview: Steele comes to the aid of an aging B-movie queen whose daughter is trying to commit her and who someone is apparently trying to kill.

episodes.name: Steele Flying High
episodes.overview: Steele gets involved with the murder of a naturalist when he serves on a committee to save the bald eagle.

episodes.name: A Good Night's Steele
episodes.overview: Laura and Steele go undercover at a sleep-disorders clinic to investigate the disappearance of morphine and a doctor.

episodes.name: Hearts of Steele
episodes.overview: Steele and Laura pose as a battling couple while they investigate murder attempts against an aggressive divorce lawyer.

episodes.name: To Stop a Steele
episodes.overview: Laura and Steele wind up working for opposite sides of a jewelry theft when the frightened thief looks for help when someone else beats him to the jewel.

episodes.name: Steele Crazy After All These Years
episodes.overview: Murphy's college homecoming is marred by a murder that awakens memories of a bombing on campus ten years before.

episodes.name: Steele Among the Living
episodes.overview: Laura searches for a vanished artist whose works have suddenly appreciated in value, for both her husband and the owner of an art gallery.

episodes.name: Steele in the News
episodes.overview: Laura and Steele investigate the increasingly dangerous pranks someone is pulling on the news team of a local television station.

episodes.name: Vintage Steele
episodes.overview: Laura's former flame asks her help when he discovers a corpse in the trunk of his car, a corpse that keeps returning as they check out a winery he's involved with.

episodes.name: Steele's Gold
episodes.overview: A prospector's journal stolen during a party leads Laura and Steele on a wild gold hunt through the desert.

episodes.name: Sting of Steele
episodes.overview: Steele's mentor, Daniel Chalmers, comes to California to ask for Steele's help in dealing with a vindictive crook.

episodes.name: Steele in Circulation
episodes.overview: Steele stops a distraught young man from killing himself then must find a missing girl and a ""borrowed"" $50,000 to keep him from trying again.

episodes.name: Steele Away with Me (1)
episodes.overview: Laura returns to Acapulco after a dying man leaves a tuna stuffed with diamonds and wrapped in an Acapulco newspaper on her doorstep. Steele joins her while trying to avoid a dogged IRS investigator, Mildred Krebs.

episodes.name: Steele Away With Me (2)
episodes.overview: Laura returns to Acapulco after a dying man leaves a tuna stuffed with diamonds and wrapped in an Acapulco newspaper on her doorstep. Steele joins her while trying to avoid a dogged IRS investigator, Mildred Krebs.

episodes.name: Red Holt Steele
episodes.overview: Laura's investigation of corporate foul play in a widow's aircraft company becomes personal when the opposition blows up her home.

episodes.name: Altared Steele
episodes.overview: A terrified client doesn't know his name, why someone is trying to kill him nor those five women claiming to be his widows.

episodes.name: Steele Framed
episodes.overview: Remington is convinced someone is out to frame him while, when responding to a mysterious phone call, he accidentally hits and kills a man who has been blackmailing him.

episodes.name: A Steele at Any Price
episodes.overview: Laura fears Reminton is enjoying himself a bit too much when a case calls for them to pull off a series of highly dangerous art thefts to thwart some crooks.

episodes.name: Love Among the Steele
episodes.overview: Laura and Remington find themselves involved in a murder and the mysterious disappearance of some million-dollar jewels.

episodes.name: Scene Steelers
episodes.overview: A poisoned TV dinner is the latest move in a long-standing quarrel between the stars of a series of television commercials.

episodes.name: Steele Knuckles and Glass Jaws
episodes.overview: A dead bookie and an abandoned baby reunite Steele with a boxing manager from his past life as the "Kilkenny Kid- Pride of the Pampas."

episodes.name: My Fair Steele
episodes.overview: Laura and Steele aid a dying man to protect the interests of his kidnapped adopted daughter using her secret twin sister.

episodes.name: Steele Threads
episodes.overview: Laura and Steele investigate industrial espionage fueled by a vicious sibling rivalry.

episodes.name: Steele Eligible
episodes.overview: Steele is named to the five most eligible bachelors in Los Angeles list but it proves a dubious honor. Someone is trying to kill them all off.

episodes.name: High Flying Steele
episodes.overview: A break-in at the agency offices prompts Laura and Remington to go undercover at the circus to unravel a murder that happened some years before.

episodes.name: Blood is Thicker Than Steele
episodes.overview: Laura and Steele must protect the rather obnoxious children of a Federal witness.

episodes.name: Steele Sweet on You
episodes.overview: Laura gets involved with her sister's marital problems at a dental convention where a murderer seeks to eliminate the only evidence left against him.

episodes.name: Elegy in Steele
episodes.overview: Major Descoine reappears and promises that Laura and Steele will die within an hour.

episodes.name: Small Town Steele
episodes.overview: When the investigators travel to the small California village of De Nada on a missing persons case, they get the feeling the whole town is hiding something from them.

episodes.name: Molten Steele
episodes.overview: Laura and Steele try to learn how and why a woman's name and phone number came to be printed in a steamy sex-magazine.

episodes.name: Dreams of Steele
episodes.overview: The reputation of the agency is at stake again when the gems that first brought them together are switched with fakes as Laura and Steele are transporting them.

episodes.name: Woman of Steele
episodes.overview: A woman from Steele's past arranges for the agency to handle the security on an exhibition at an art museum, and contacts Steele with a desperate plea for help.

episodes.name: Hounded Steele
episodes.overview: Laura and Remington come to the rescue after Mildred inadvertently uncovers a bizarre plot involving a priceless diamond and a famous retired jewel thief.

episodes.name: Elementary Steele
episodes.overview: Someone is using mystery buffs signed up to solve a make-believe case to find a murderous embezzler. (60 min)

episodes.name: Steele at It
episodes.overview: Laura is ready for romance as they vacation on the French Riviera, but old friends needing his help in stealing a dagger distract Steele.

episodes.name: Lofty Steele
episodes.overview: Laura faces angry neighbors and threats against her life as someone tries to run her out of her loft apartment.

episodes.name: Maltese Steele
episodes.overview: Laura and Steele search for a missing body on the island of Malta, but find an insignificant piece of brass that could get them killed.

episodes.name: Second Base Steele
episodes.overview: A reunion of high-school athletes at an adult baseball camp is marred by a series of ""accidents"" that Laura and Steele are hired to investigate.

episodes.name: Blue Blooded Steele
episodes.overview: Daniel Chalmers enters Steele's life again when it appears that he is about to inherit an English title, its fortune and some enemies.

episodes.name: Steele Your Heart Away
episodes.overview: Laura flies off to help an amnesiac Steele recall why he came to Ireland and why someone is trying to kill him.

episodes.name: A Pocketful of Steele
episodes.overview: Steele tries to help a street-wise kid who picks his pocket and grabs evidence that a loan shark will do anything to retrieve.

episodes.name: Puzzled Steele
episodes.overview: Laura and Steele accept the invitation of an eccentric millionaire to compete in finding a missing journalist but the game soon turns deadly.

episodes.name: Cast in Steele
episodes.overview: Three aging film stars hire Steele and Laura to find out who is behind their curious fan mail and the attempts on their lives.

episodes.name: Breath of Steele
episodes.overview: Laura and Steele try to protect two singing-telegram girls who witnessed a murder while they also hunt for the killers.

episodes.name: Let's Steele a Plot
episodes.overview: Laura and Steele get lots of advice and help when they investigate the embezzlement of a mystery-writers guild's treasury.

episodes.name: Gourmet Steele
episodes.overview: Steele inadvertently goes undercover as the restaurant critic they've been hired to find, and who has incensed several restaurant owners with his blistering reviews.

episodes.name: Stronger Than Steele
episodes.overview: Laura has a personal stake in the investigation of the death of a movie producer who was planning on making a movie of an old TV series without the original star.

episodes.name: Have I Got a Steele For You
episodes.overview: Mulch returns with a new business venture that his partner is using to swindle an investor.

episodes.name: Springtime For Steele
episodes.overview: The unexpected success of singer Rocky Sullivan threatens a little scheme cooked up by her managers and might get her killed.

episodes.name: Steele in the Family
episodes.overview: Mildred's nephew comes to her for some help in hiding the body a hit man needs to confirm his contract with his employers.

episodes.name: Diced Steele
episodes.overview: An investigator from an insurance company digs into Steele's past after the agency loses their money in an effort to buy back stolen jewels.

episodes.name: Now You Steele It, Now You Don't
episodes.overview: Laura feels used when she discovers an importer has killed himself after she delivers a message to him.

episodes.name: Illustrated Steele
episodes.overview: A young cartoonist finds his life threatened as the events of his strip start happening to him.

episodes.name: Steele in the Chips
episodes.overview: Laura and Steele get involved in the search for the inventor of a no-cal cookie and his only batch of prototypes.

episodes.name: Steele Trying
episodes.overview: Mr. Steele's plans for a romantic weekend in San Francisco are upset when his imaginary case turns into a real one.

episodes.name: Steele of Approval
episodes.overview: Laura investigates the background of a senatorial candidate while Steele dodges an investigator from the state licensing board.

episodes.name: Steele Searching (1)
episodes.overview: Laura races with Scotland Yard to locate Steele, who has become involved in murder while searching for a man with a clue to his past. Steele masquerades as an assassin hired by Daniel Chalmers to kill the Earl of Claridge.

episodes.name: Steele Searching (2)
episodes.overview: Laura races with Scotland Yard to locate Steele, who has become involved in murder while searching for a man with a clue to his past. Steele masquerades as an assassin hired by Daniel Chalmers to kill the Earl of Claridge.

episodes.name: Steele Blushing
episodes.overview: Laura protects a photographer and his files from angry clients and the FBI even after her doctored photo appears in a porno magazine.

episodes.name: Grappling Steele
episodes.overview: Laura and Steele are hired to protect a professional wrestler who has been receiving death threats and having mysterious ""accidents.""

episodes.name: Forged Steele
episodes.overview: Steele awakens from a 36-hour blackout to find that he has apparently gambled away the agency.

episodes.name: Corn Fed Steele
episodes.overview: Laura and Steele look into the disappearance of some prized breeding pigs from an experimental farm in Iowa.

episodes.name: Premium Steele
episodes.overview: Laura and Steele try to discover why phony obituaries are being printed about people like poor garlic farmer Lester Shane.

episodes.name: Coffee, Tea, or Steele
episodes.overview: Laura and Steele fly the unfriendly skies to learn why the body of a hired killer turned up on the baggage carrousel of a luxury airline.

episodes.name: Dancer, Prancer, Donner and Steele
episodes.overview: The agency Christmas party is interrupted by three gun-wielding Santas who take everyone hostage and threaten to blow up the building.

episodes.name: Steele on the Air
episodes.overview: A traffic reporter dies while aloft in a helicopter and the two prime suspects are the disc jockeys, who were on the air at the time.

episodes.name: Steele, Inc.
episodes.overview: Mulch's latest brainstorm to franchise the agency gets an unfortunate investigator killed by an angry client.

episodes.name: Steele Spawning
episodes.overview: Laura and Steele are hired by the spoiled son of a caviar importer to find a missing shipment before daddy returns home.

episodes.name: Suburban Steele
episodes.overview: Laura's sister finds a dead body on her kitchen floor and asks for help from a reluctant Laura and Steele.

episodes.name: Santa Claus is Coming to Steele
episodes.overview: One of the phony Santas from the ill-fated Christmas party returns to persuade witness not to testify against him.

episodes.name: Steele Blue Yonder
episodes.overview: A woman is afraid her father may need help but Laura and Steele learn he knows exactly what he's doing.

episodes.name: Sensitive Steele
episodes.overview: Laura and Steele go undercover at a self-improvement spa to find out why there have been a series of mysterious accidents.

episodes.name: Steele in the Spotlight
episodes.overview: The search for a singer from the fifties has unexpected, deadly consequences.

episodes.name: Steele at Your Service
episodes.overview: The servants of the wealthy Wellingtons hire Laura and Steele to find out who killed the former butler, who had planned on publishing his memoirs.

episodes.name: Steele in the Running
episodes.overview: Laura is assaulted while running in a triathlon after a desperate woman switches numbers with her.

episodes.name: Beg, Borrow, or Steele
episodes.overview: Laura and Steele return from the East to find reports of their murder on the news and Mildred arrested for the crime.

episodes.name: Steele Alive and Kicking
episodes.overview: A man who framed himself so his wife could collect the reward learns he isn't terminally ill and wants Laura and Steele to clear him.

episodes.name: Bonds of Steele
episodes.overview: Laura has her hands full trying to discover why an accountant at a huge corporation was killed while Steele handles several mysterious errands of his own.

episodes.name: The Steele That Wouldn't Die (1)
episodes.overview: Steele is arrested for the murder of Norman Keyes while he and Laura try to honeymoon in Mexico.

episodes.name: The Steele That Wouldn't Die (2)
episodes.overview: Steele is arrested for the murder of Norman Keyes while he and Laura try to honeymoon in Mexico.

episodes.name: Steele Hanging in There (1)
episodes.overview: Their phony marriage faces a real test when a woman from Steele's past shows up, pretending to be married to him and the archaeologist from Mexico returns, this time as an immigration officer. In London, Tony blackmails Steele into delivering a dangerous package, while Laura delves into Shannon's past.

episodes.name: Steele Hanging in There (2)
episodes.overview: Their phony marriage faces a real test when a woman from Steele's past shows up, pretending to be married to him and the archaeologist from Mexico returns, this time as an immigration officer. In London, Tony blackmails Steele into delivering a dangerous package, while Laura delves into Shannon's past.

episodes.name: Steeled With a Kiss (1)
episodes.overview: Laura and Steele visit the Irish castle he's inherited and decide to hide Tony there until he can prove he isn't a double agent. Daniel Chalmers must turn him over to the KGB as part of a scam he is running to help the daughter of an old friend.

episodes.name: Steeled With a Kiss (2)
episodes.overview: Laura and Steele visit the Irish castle he's inherited and decide to hide Tony there until he can prove he isn't a double agent. Daniel Chalmers must turn him over to the KGB as part of a scam he is running to help the daughter of an old friend.
